item.text: The [[Viral Academy]] is a P2P framework for creating online and offline learning experiences. Students are encouraged to pass on their learning by the built in [[Learning TimeBank]], which enables us to offer all courses for free to anyone in the world.
item.title: Viral Academy Methodology

item.text: The [[Viral Academy]] is a framework, and technical platform for creating online and offline learning experiences. We focus on small group work, and P2P tutoring. Students are encouraged to pass on their learning through a built in [[Learning TimeBank]]. Our courses are free culture, and our software is free software.
